Package com.t3.midterm

Class EmployeeInterface

java.lang.Object
com.t3.midterm.EmployeeInterface
public class EmployeeInterface extends Object
The main interface between the driver/command line and the database. Must be instantiated with a DataSource

  • Constructor Summary

  • Method Details

    • createEmployee

      public void createEmployee​(String fName, String lName)
      Creates a new employee with given first and last name with an auto- incrementing id
      Parameters:
      fName - New first name
      lName - New last name

    • selectEmployee

      public Employee selectEmployee​(String fName, String lName)
      Return employee object matching both first and last name. This does not account for overlap of names so in the case of two rows having matching first and last names, it will return the one with the largest ID. Also note that, since the SQL WHERE keyword is used, it is only case sensitive if specified in the schema.
      Parameters:
      fName - First name of target
      lName - Last name of target
      Returns:
      An Employee object matching the name passed

    • selectEmployee

      public Employee selectEmployee​(int idNumber)
      Return employee object corresponding to the idNumber parameter.
      Parameters:
      idNumber - ID of target employee
      Returns:
      An Employee object matching the ID passed

    • selectAllEmployee

      public List<Employee> selectAllEmployee()
      Return a List<Employee> containing all employees in the DB.
      Returns:
      A List<Employee> containing all employees in the DB.

    • updateEmployee

      public void updateEmployee​(int idNumber, String fName, String lName)
      Given a first name and last name, update the names columns in the row corresponding to idNumber.
      Parameters:
      idNumber - ID of target employee
      fName - New first name
      lName - New last name

    • deleteEmployee

      public void deleteEmployee​(int toDeleteId)
      Delete the row in the table corresponding to idNumber.
      Parameters:
      toDeleteId - ID of target employee
